title: PsyGrid: e-Science to Improve the Understanding and Treatment of People in their First Episode of Psychosis
abstractText: Establishing an e-community on the basis of the Mental Health Research Network will have as one of its longer term aims a promotion of new ways to engage the public in issues concerning mental health research. Public education and engagement is part of the wider brief of the National Institute for Mental Health (England) and this proposal fits in closely to this.
